Title: Provides for a sales and use tax exemption for items necessary for the care and safety of an infant or small child, and to allowing the city of New York to opt out of such tax exemption as applied to local taxes
Summary: Provides for a sales and use tax exemption for items necessary for the care and safety of an infant or small child, including, but not limited to strollers, car seats, infant and toddler mattresses, and cribs and to allowing the city of New York to opt out of such tax exemption as applied to local taxes by passing a resolution.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing for a sales and use tax exemption for items necessary for the care and safety of an infant or small child, and to allowing the city of New York to opt out of such tax exemption as applied to local taxes
